original: Think happy thoughts!  H4PP1 works by taking away the ability to think or feel.  Float through your day on a cloud of numb disinterest.  Scrape yourself off the bottom of the barrel and rearrange your body chemistry forever with H4PP1.  Warning:  if you ever stop taking it, you will kill yourself.
translated: 想想高兴的事吧！H4PP1能让你失去思考与感受的能力，一整天都飘飘欲仙、醉生梦死。做出绝路上唯一的选择，把体内的化学反应永远交给H4PP1吧。警告：一旦停药，你就会自杀。
